https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/ow6QDvGwXGeqH4sCW4OQdEPY221.jpg The main character is an Opel Astra car. The car has become an integral part of every person's life. In the short stories the characters work and rest together with the Opel Astra, meet, get to know each other and fall in love, quarrel and make peace. Astra, i love you
